body:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
<style>
.body { background-color: #DCF2F1; margin: 0px; }
.header { background-color: #365486; padding-left: 25px; }
nav ul { list-style: none; padding: 10px; display: flex; border-radius: 4px; margin: 0px; }
nav ul li { padding: 10px; flex: 1; text-align: center; margin: 0px; }
.flex-container { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; justify-content: space-between; margin: 10px 30px; }
.flex-item { padding: 20px; background-color: #c2e4ec; border-radius: 5px; margin: 10px; box-sizing: border-box; }
.half { flex: 0 0 48%; }
.full { flex: 0 0 99%; }
.quarter { flex: 0 0 23%; }
a.button { padding: 10px 15px; background-color: #365486; color: white; border-radius: 4px; display: inline-block; text-decoration: none; transition: transform 0.3s; }
a.button:hover { transform: scale(1.05); }
a.button-header { padding: 10px 15px; margin: 10px 30px 10px 5px; background-color: #0F1035; font-size: 20px; color: white; border-radius: 4px; display: inline-block; text-decoration: none; }
.image-container { overflow: hidden; padding: 15px; background-color: #c2e4ec; border-radius: 5px; width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; }
.image-container img { max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; margin: 0 auto; }
</style>
    <title>GeneratedHTML</title>
  </head>
  <body class="body">
    <main class="container">
      {}
    </main>
  </body>
</html>
